name: Go! Go! Franklin
description:
"Go Go Franklin is an excellent toddlers and kids app...5 out of 5 stars." -Top Best Apps for Kids.com

Speed to the finish line with Go! Go! Franklin, a single player skateboarding game filled with obstacles, jumps, loops, power-ups and so much more. Help Franklin reach the finish line before time runs out, by performing a variety of amazing aerial tricks. With hours and hours of fast paced action, Go! Go! Franklin will enthrall kids all the way to the finish line!

ESRB Rating: EVERYONE

Highlights:

•Enjoy 20 randomly generated levels!

•Perform aerial tricks off of jumps, railings, and other obstacles!

•Stunning graphics, fun music and rewarding sound effects!

•Show off your High Scores as you race against time!

•Unlock Special Trophies to prove you're the skateboarding champion!
